synopsis.text:
Official music video for the track "Dokidoki DREAM!!!" takes center stage, performed by the fictional band Irodorimidori, a beloved creation from Sega's Chunithm rhythm arcade game. Serving as the 11th installment in the Irodorimidori series, this captivating tune is sure to leave a lasting impression.

At the esteemed Maigahara Senior High School, where musical prowess reigns supreme, the members of Irodorimidori are on a quest for perfection. As they strive to synchronize their talents and create harmonious melodies, they aspire to ascend the ranks and become the school's most celebrated band. With unwavering determination and a passion for music, nothing can stand in their way. Prepare to be captivated by the enchanting journey of Irodorimidori as they bring their Dokidoki Dream to life!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
